power.title: Argent Mantle
power.fluff: You channel divine light and thunder through your holy symbol, smiting enemies nearby, and for the rest of the battle, a mantle of silver light clings to your shoulders as a sign of divine favor

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you can reroll the damage roll for any Avenger attack power you use, including this one. You reroll the whole damage, and must use the second result.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant and thunder damage.

power.title: Aspect of Might
power.fluff: You strike a crippling blow against your foe, and divine power bolsters you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:
+2 power bonus to damage rolls with melee attacks.

power.title: Celestial Fist
power.fluff: A great fist of light smashes down at your enemy, and then holds the foe fast in its grip

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Each Failed Save:
section.text: The target takes radiant damage equal to 5 + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Oath of the Final Duel
power.fluff: You swear an oath that you will slay the foe before you, and as along as you work to fulfill this oath, that foe cannot escape

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you can use the following action once on each of your turns:

power.section: true 1 Minor Action:Requirement: The target is more than 3 squares away at the start of your turn; You teleport to a space within 3 squares of the target.

section.text: This effect ends if you end your turn more than 3 squares away from the target.

power.title: Renewing Lightning
power.fluff: You draw on your deity's power to smite your foe with divine lightning and to heal your injuries

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

power.title: Steelsworn Oath
power.fluff: As you swing your weapon at your enemy, you infuse the attack with the power of divine retribution, and the power lingers on your foe

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Before resolving the attack, the target becomes your oath target, replacing any you might currently have.

power.title: Strength of Many
power.fluff: You call on the loyalty and courage of your allies to strike a mighty blow

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a cumulative +2 bonus to damage rolls for each ally within 2 squares of you.

power.title: Temple of Light
power.fluff: Your weapon strike creates a field of searing energy around an enemy, allowing your attacks to burn any foe you hit within the field

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The attack creates a zone of radiant energy in a burst 2 centered on the target until the end of the encounter. When the target moves, the zone moves with it, remaining centered on it.
Whenever you hit a creature that is within the zone, that attack deals an additional +1d6 radiant damage.

power.title: Thunder and Echo
power.fluff: Thunder rides your weapon and then reverberates around you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make the Reverberating Thunder attack.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You use the weapon you used for the primary attack as an implement for this attack, even if you are not normally proficient in that weapon as an implement.

section.name: Thunder Attack:
section.target: each enemy in the burst other than the primary target

section.text: If the primary attack missed, you gain combat advantage for this attack

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push the thunder target 2 squares.

power.title: Wings of Light
power.fluff: Shining wings sprout from your shoulders for a moment, carrying you swiftly to your sworn foe

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You fly up to 6 squares to a space adjacent to your oath target. This counts as a shift.
